name: Koushien V
overview: Koshien Five Baseball is a 3D baseball game with different game modes that includes vs and story mode and is the first game in the Koshien baseball series for the Playstation One console that also still continues in the Playstation 2 console with their 2000, 2001, 2002, 2003 & 2004 games. The game focus in the high school baseball tournaments and got data of more than 4129 japanese high schools. The game focus on the baseball strategy and tactics.The game allows the player to train his players and their teamwork. The goal of the game is to win the '98 Koshien Baseball championship. The game also allows the player to edit the team logo, school hymn or the team uniforms. Also Known as Koushien V.
